job.title: Software Developer
job.description: Centurion is seeking a  Software Developer with a focus on Java-based algorithm development  to be part of a dynamic team. We are a collaborative environment that fosters advanced research, concept exploration, product development and interaction with the nation’s leading aviation subject matter experts. We pride ourselves on a work environment where employees can succeed. Responsibilities: • Evaluation and ownership of existing frameworks to design, develop and test Algorithms • Apply technical creativity to develop and implement new tools to analyze and improve algorithm performance • Create new algorithms based on a sequence of requirements • Provide support in the areas of data extraction, transformation and load, data mapping, data extraction, analytical support, operational support, database support, and maintenance support of data and associated systems • Apply troubleshooting skills to challenging problems • Develop standards, procedures and guidelines to ensure algorithm performance is consistent or improving • Develop highly scalable application infrastructure that powers data collection and processing services Requirements: • BS degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering or related technical field • Experience designing, developing and implementing mathematical programming Algorithms in one or more of the following languages/tools: • Experience working in Windows and Linux OS environments and simple scripting (grep, shell, bash, etc) • Experience with Java or another object-oriented programming language • Solid understanding of programming principles, designs, and patterns, and associated tooling and frameworks • Experience with querying databases (Oracle and/or Mongo) • Excellent analytical, data mining, troubleshooting and problem-solving skills • Strong collaborator and experienced working in dynamic teams working • Strong written and oral communication skills • Ability to handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced environment • Must be a quick learner and self-motivated • 3+ years of experience required Position Details: • Clearance: Ability to Obtain a Public Trust • US Citizenship or Authorization to work in US required • Travel: < 10% (CONUS) • Centurion Consulting Group, LLC is an Equal Opportunity Employer EOE M/F/D/V • No third parties or subcontractors
